magneton.name: magneton
magneton.description:
Formed by several
MAGNEMITEs linked
together. They frequently appear
when sunspots
flare up.

magmar.name: magmar
magmar.description:
Its body always
burns with an
orange glow that enables it to
hide perfectly
among flames.

sunflora.name: sunflora
sunflora.description:
It converts sun­
light into energy.
In the darkness after sunset, it
closes its petals
and becomes still.

golem.name: golem
golem.description:
Its boulder-like
body is extremely
hard. It can easily withstand
dynamite blasts
without damage.

pichu.name: pichu
pichu.description:
It is not yet
skilled at storing
electricity. It may send out a
jolt if amused
or startled.

paras.name: paras
paras.description:
Burrows to suck
tree roots. The
mushrooms on its back grow by draw­
ing nutrients from
the bug host.
